meanings.definition: Traditional beliefs, customs, and stories of a community.
meanings.sent1: The folklores of this town are passed down from generation to generation.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading about different folklores from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they listened to the old man tell the folklores of their ancestors.
meanings.sent4: The folklores woven into the fabric of society shape our cultural identity.
meanings.sent5: The colorful folklores painted a vivid picture of the community's history.

meanings.definition: The study of traditional beliefs, customs, and stories.
meanings.sent1: In college, she specialized in folklores and cultural studies.
meanings.sent2: The professor's office was filled with books on various folklores.
meanings.sent3: Studying folklores requires a deep understanding of different cultures.
meanings.sent4: The researcher delved into the intricate web of folklores to uncover hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: Through folklores, we gain insight into the values of different societies.

meanings.definition: A collection of traditional beliefs, customs, and stories.
meanings.sent1: The library has a vast collection of folklores from different regions.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a treasure trove of folklores from her grandparents.
meanings.sent3: The museum's exhibit showcased a diverse array of folklores.
meanings.sent4: The anthology of folklores provided a glimpse into ancient traditions.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the collection of folklores opened up a world of imagination.
